ul.li: One U-tube manometer, recommended ranges; 0-14” W.C. (0-3.5 kPa) and 0-35” W.C. (0-8.7 kPa) or pressure gauges.

One digital manometer can be used in place of U-tube manometers or pressure gauges. Recommended ranges; -14.00 to +14.00” W.C. (0-3.5 kPa) resolution 0.01” W.C. and 0-35” W.C. (0-8.7 kPa) resolution 0.10” W.C.

conbody.note: All test equipment must be acclimated to ambient temperature before calibration and use.
